message: Let's be practical, Bob. This offer saves us both from inflation.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think it's fair considering the inflation will affect you more.  Let's work together to get something before it's too late!

Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. Let's meet in the middle.  This is the same split you offered, but now inflation has eaten into it even more. It's better to take this deal now before it gets any worse.
